org.wmn4j.notation.builders

Class NoteBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.builders.NoteBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DurationalBuilder

    public class NoteBuilder
extends Object
implements DurationalBuilder
    Class for building Note objects. The built note is cached. This is used for ensuring that sequences of tied notes are built correctly.

    • Constructor Summary

      • addTieToFollowing

        public void addTieToFollowing(NoteBuilder builder)
        Tie this builder to a following builder. The builder that this is tied to should be built before this. When the notes are built the Note returned by the call of build on this will be tied to the Note built by builder.
        Parameters:
        builder - The builder for the following note that this is to be tied to.

      • getTiedTo

        public Note getTiedTo()
        Returns the following note to which this builder is tied.
        Returns:
        the note to which this is tied

      • setTiedTo

        public void setTiedTo(Note tiedTo)
        Sets this to be tied to the given note.
        Parameters:
        tiedTo - the note to which this is set to be tied

      • isTiedFromPrevious

        public boolean isTiedFromPrevious()
        Returns true if this is tied from the previous note or notebuilder.
        Returns:
        true if this is tied from the previous note or notebuilder

      • setIsTiedFromPrevious

        public void setIsTiedFromPrevious(boolean isTiedFromPrevious)
        Sets this to be tied from the previous.
        Parameters:
        isTiedFromPrevious - the value that defines whether this is tied from the previous note or note builder

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Removes the cached Note that was built on the previous call of build.

      • build

        public Note build()
        Creates a Note with the values set in this builder. This method has side effects. The method calls build recursively on the following NoteBuilder objects to which this is tied. Calling this method to create the first note in a sequence of tied notes builds all the tied notes. The Note objects are cached in the builders. In case of tied notes, the temporally first one should be built first.
        Specified by:
        build in interface DurationalBuilder
        Returns:
        Note instance with the values set in this builder.
